name: Solitaire - Classic Edition
description:
Solitaire is also known as Klondike Solitaire and Patience.
It is the most popular solitaire card game in the world.

We kept alive the traditions of the classical Solitaire that you love so much, giving you the option to spice it up if you want to ! It includes the following features:

+ Draw 1 card
+ Draw 3 cards
+ Winning deals only
+ Classical scoring
+ Unlimited undo
+ Unlimited hints to give you advice on possible moves

Beautiful graphics and sounds to give you the most comfortable experience:
+ Sound, music and timer can be turned on and off
+ 30 card & 6 background designs available
+ Auto-complete animation for solved games

Simple and handy interface:
+ Single tap or drag and drop to move a card
+ Left or Right handed mode

Online competition and personal stats to keep track of your performance:
+ Your statistics for every game type
+ Invite your friends to compete with you
+ Check your global and local ranking

You will enjoy playing this classical Solitaire for sure.
